title: Video: Beware of Cashing in on Credit Card Hopping
text:
Beware of Cashing in on Credit Card Hopping By Share Is it wrong to make $1000 by credit card hopping? The Moneyologist weighs in on Lunch Break with Tanya Rivero and points out hidden risks for consumers. Photo: Getty Posted October 9, 2015 Back to Top
